articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: Umpire Marais Erasmus to retire after second New Zealand-Australia Test - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: He will finish his international career having stood as an on-field umpire in 82 men's Tests, 124 men's ODIs, 43 men's T20Is and 18 women's T20Is
articles.content: NewsHe will finish his international career having stood as an on-field umpire in 82 men's Tests, 124 men's ODIs, 43 men's T20Is and 18 women's T20Is
